dragDropArea.mainMessage: Drag and drop any <u>image</u> files here!
dragDropArea.subMessage: You can drop <u>zip files</u> or <u>folders</u> too.
dragDropArea.neverStoreYourData: We never store your files in the server.

messages.reachedEnd: You have reached the end of the list.
messages.reachedBeginning: You have reached the beginning of the list.
messages.longTouch: Press anywhere and hold for 1 sec to reveal more information.
